channel.title: [PI] Varrock Coords
channel.description:
Who wants to become my new best friend by giving me the coordinates to all of varrock not including the banks (bank not in the coords list please)!
I will love you forever.
I want to make varrock pvp. I just need the coords, if by any chance someone has them please post them

item.title: [PI] Varrock Coords
item.dc:creator: @High105 High105
item.description:
@High105 wrote:

shank beast:

You don’t want the banks where they usually are? like you want to delete them? if so, delete itin object manager (i think)

No, im making a pvp zone… But I guess I can just make the banks a safe zone.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Varrock Coords
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

3210,3424 <-- Varrock code

that’s all you need if you need more coords you can go ahead and do ::mypos, and get your position we dont spoonfeed and you can easily use my favorite website called google, before posting this…

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) { c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX); c.sendMessage("Y: "+c.absY); c.sendMessage("mapregionX: " + c.mapRegionX); c.sendMessage("mapregionY: " + c.mapRegionY); }

Mypos command incase you dont have it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Varrock Coords
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

You donot need all coords for varrock to create a hotspot, you must make a box like coord… you take coords from the 4 corners of varrock or the whole area or w.e and you add hotspot to it. i’m not good with making pvp honestly.

Read full topic
